title: BRIEF-Atento SA Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Shr $0.21
text: March 19, 2018 / 10:28 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Atento SA Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Shr $0.21 Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Atento Sa: * ATENTO REPORTS FISCAL 2017 FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS, HIGHLIGHTED BY REVENUE AND EPS GROWTH * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.12 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.21 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES ‍CONSTANT CURRENCY REVENUE GROWTH OF 3% TO 6% AND ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGIN OF 11%-12% FOR FISCAL 2018​ * QTRLY REVENUE $478.3 MILLION VERSUS $442.0 MLN‍​ * ‍NATURAL DISASTERS IN MEXICO AND PUERTO RICO IMPACTED ADJUSTED EBITDA IN Q4 BY $0.9 MILLION​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24, REVENUE VIEW $508.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
